No way... You damn freaks...
Having his forces defeated, the mortally wounded dwarven king fell to the floor.
Phew... finally.
Thanks Rilu, you were a great help.
Indeed, we wouldn't make it without you.
But how did you... Well...
It's okay. I can't die.
You do bleed a lot though.
Ember, that was a bit too rude.
Oh... Sorry...
Don't worry about it. I have a habit of such.
But what was that magic you used? I don't think I've seen it before.
I'm a necromancer. It's a power of both the dead and spirits.
(S-spirits? I knew it must be something creepy, but this is even worse...)
Awesome! You can do something like that?
I swear, the dead are so useless on their own. Can you also make skeletons and zombies?
W-well...
Sir Arron is really into weird things.
Hey Rose, why are you so pale all of a sudden?
Wait, you are still afraid of ghosts and stuff? Come on, you are an adult now.
I-I'm not, I'm just tired from the fight. Anyway, let's leave this place already.
